text:
I first switched to Dr Elsey‚Äôs litter probably 10 years ago. I had a cat that kept going to the bathroom suddenly everywhere, but in the litter box. After binge watching my cat from hell, I think the show is called. I knew that she was doing it because she didn‚Äôt like something. I also took her to the vet to see if she had an infection but she did not previously I was using a very heavily scented Super lightweight litter from Walmart. I changed everything that she possibly could be hating about her litter box from removing the bag, to getting a bigger box, getting rid of the scented litter, getting rid of the lightweight litter that might get stuck in her feet, etc..

When I first tried this brand, it was the cat attract formula. I use that one or the one in the blue bag with some of the cat attract scent added in. It worked like a charm, and she started using the box again I kept using this brand in the blue bag because I really liked how hard it clumps when it clumps that hard. It‚Äôs super easy to scoop out and it keeps the rest of the litter, fresh or longer. I didn‚Äôt need the really strong smelling brand because it never stunk at all once I switched to this brand I‚Äôve been a loyal user ever since.

A few months ago this style was on sale somewhere and I thought I would try it. Holy cow it‚Äôs even better than the blue style! It clumps just as hard, still no smell, and it really really does reduce the amount of tracking. It cost a little bit more than the other style, but it‚Äôs worth it. I‚Äôve also noticed that I seem to go through less litter and the bags are lasting longer, so it actually might even be a better deal than the previous sale that I was using.

I highly recommend Dr. Elseys litter, no matter which style you choose. You really can‚Äôt go wrong. This is a really premium brand and worth every penny.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 14 de octubre de 2025
